thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Jinling Sports Equipment sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 5 pct to increase by 4.7 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Jinling Sports Equipment sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 5 pct to increase by 4.7 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - jiangsu jinling sports equipment co ltd

text:
Jan 18(Reuters) - Jiangsu Jinling Sports Equipment Co Ltd :
* Says FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 5 percent to increase by 4.7 percent, or to be 44 million yuan to 48.5 million yuan, compared to net profit of FY 2016 (46.3 million yuan)
* Says increased sales revenue and decreased gross margin as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/5mZ9xt
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
